recipesJson.name: Blueberry Lemonade
recipesJson.author: EdibleMalfunction
recipesJson.description: Its Blueberry Lemonade using the Holy Trinity Blueberry base. Add sweetener if you so desire, I don't think LA Lemonade ever needs any.

reviews.text: Great stuff! Also nice in a pod device if you crank the ws-23 up to 1%. It’s not really sweet imo but it doesn’t hast to be. My friends keep asking me to mix this for them. Thanks for sharing!

Just mixed this up, and honestly just the smell alone is amazing. After vaping it, I have to say this is one of the nicest blueberry lemonades I've tasted. Its full of Blueberry but has the lemon coming right after, and the WS-23 adds the cooling effect to really tie off the drink feel. Thanks for the amazing recipe, ed =)
